code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{WeatherService}from'../services/weather/weatherService';export const useWeatherData=(location,selectedDay)=>{const[data,setData]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);setError(null);const forecast=await WeatherService.getWeatherForecast(location,selectedDay);setData(forecast);}catch(err){setError(err instanceof Error?err.message:'Failed to fetch weather data');}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[location,selectedDay]);return{firstDay:data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.firstDay,secondDay:data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.secondDay,loading,error};};
